availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Wollerman (Louisville, Kentucky, tailor and clerk)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tailor and clerk. Native of Bremen, Germany. Married to Eliza Emmery Wollerman in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 2, 1855. Father of Adolph H. Wollerman and Annie Isabelle Wollerman. Immigrated to the United States on October 31, 1849. Tailor in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Tailor in Louisville in 1860. Tailor in Louisville in 1861. Tailor's clerk in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
